column4: i try to install the ubuntu linux by install cd to HP E vectra
but everytime the process come to configuring network
it will said that the DHCP can't be found
or the network card is not installed properly
and i try to set ut up manually
i cant connect to the internet
so i'm using the other pc now
check the dgcp pool setting on the router
if you do a lspci see the nic?
if you cant see with lspci the nic isn't work
ok. You must know wich type of nic works on the mobo
